snippet: In Seoul or Beijing, craving some mountain air? Do you want to get out on the waterways of Hong Kong? Three of our correspondents in Asia have some suggestions for treks. Read theirs and tell us yours.
abstract: In Seoul or Beijing, craving some mountain air? Do you want to get out on the waterways of Hong Kong? Three of our correspondents in Asia have some suggestions for treks. Read theirs and tell us yours.

headline.main: A Change of Scenery a Short Hop From Asia's Cities
